title: Skins with beards
body:
So, out of all human male champions with no face cover, only {{champion:2}} , and like 3 of them have moustaches and {{champion:23}}  has a goatee or smth xD
I would really really love to see more beards on others...let's say if we get a skin for {{champion:122}} where he can be a little bit older with a nice beard, he will look so bad ass.
Or if you can add tattoos, like you did on that Chroma for Mafia {{champion:201}} , that would be amazing. 
I don't have a problem with most of the male champions being clean shaved, but beards can really enhance their looks and bring more diversity in skins.
